overview: Eran is an Technology professional with 15 years of experience in development (web & client/server), networking and hardware. Last year, Eran has founded Yooguide, a startup in the consumer-internet-mobile space, together with Shirley Cohen-Mintz and Yonit Kariri. Since 2002, Eran has managed DoctorGiga, a NYC based IT consulting company he founded, providing services for SMBs. Eran has worked with clients both in the United States and Israel.
